allowance(address,address).details: returns the allowance the spender has been approved to spend  from the owner

params.owner_: address: the address of the owner of the funds
params.spender: address: the address of the spender
address: the address to be approved

params.amount: uint256: the amount of tokens to burn
uint256: the amount of token to burn
params.from: address: the address to burn from

params.amount: uint256: the amount of tokens to mint
params.recipient: address: the address to mint the token to

params.from: address: the address to send the funds from
params.to: address: the address to send the funds to

approve(address,uint256).notice: Allows a user to approve another account to spend their funds

balanceOf(address).notice: Read only function to retrieve the token balance of a given account. The `view` modifier indicates that it doesn't modify the contract's state, which allows us to call it without executing a transaction.

burn(uint256).notice: Burns tokens from the user's account

burnFrom(address,uint256).notice: If approved, allows a user to burn another user's tokens

constructor.notice: Contract initialization. The `constructor` is executed only once when the contract is created.

decimals().notice: Read-only function to retrieve the decimals of the token

mint(address,uint256).notice: Mints tokens to a target address

name().notice: Read-only function to retrieve the name of the token

owner().notice: Read-only function to retrieve the address of the owner

symbol().notice: Read-only function to retrieve the symbol of the token

totalSupply().notice: Read-only function to retrieve the total supply at the time queried

transfer(address,uint256).notice: A function to transfer tokens. The `external` modifier makes a function *only* callable from outside the contract.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: If approved, allows the user to send funds from another account
